name: VR Exploration Demo
description:
University of Tulsa - CSG Volunteer Project

Title: VR Exploration Demo
Platform: PC | VR-VIVE
Genre: Simulation | Exploration
Rating: E
Target Market: 10+

Simulation Overview:
Open-world exploration in Virtual Reality. The player/user will explore the terrain and interact with the environment.

The University of Tulsa, Tandy School of Computer Science, Computer Simulation & Gaming (CSG) students were given the challenge to create a VR Exploration Demo in one week, for a presentation for the Deans off.

This volunteer project consisted of primary freshmen, sophomores, and one senior in CSG. Each student took different roles on the project and was supervised by Professor Akram Taghavi-Burris

Instructions: 
Download and install the EXE file. 
Use the joystick (Occulus) or trackpad (Vive) to move around, use the button (Occulus) or remote squeeze (Vive) to select. 

Published/Updated Date: 2021
